content:
alexcrichton opened PR #11335 from alexcrichton:never-colocate-libcalls to bytecodealliance:main:

I think that this is the cause of a fuzz-bug on OSS-Fuzz and also explains why I can't reproduce locally. Why it's just now reproducing is something I'm not sure of but I believe this has always been an issue. Effectively ensure that cranelift-fuzzgen never flags libcalls as colocated because we don't know where the libcalls will be relative to the finalized generated code.
